DOC.HEADLINE: INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS ; GLOBAL MARKETS AND ECONOMIC UPDATE
DOC.TEXT: MEXICAN STOCKS * The Bolsa index has continued to rise steadily every day since May 16 , when it closed at 2 # 239.84. On Tuesday the index rose 3.64 points , or 0.16 % , over the previous day.The market has been following the New York trading of American depository receipts , or ADRs , of many Mexican blue_chips , especially Telefonos de Mexico , also known as Telmex . * Among widely held issues , Telmex Series L shares were up 0.59 % at 10.24 , Televisa CPO shares were up 1.21 % at 91.70 , and Cifra Series C shares were up 0.68 % at 8.86. * Traders said the central_bank tried to sell 350 million new pesos in treasury_bills to drain funds but found no buyers . Source : Times wire_services SPOTLIGHT : AUSTRIA Austria appears to have weathered the recession in Europe better than its neighbors , thanks to improved production , a small rise in domestic demand and increased exports to Eastern Europe , the Far East and the United States . Unemployment last year was 6.8 % , compared to double-digit rates in most of Western Europe . Sources : Bank of America ; World Information Services
